backend/main.mo: Defines installation and effect types, stores installations in an array, and provides a query to check if a given parent matches any installation's parent field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing planned UI features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the Create Instance entry point and placeholder UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping various frontend documentation and source files to concise descriptions for build planning.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document detailing Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installation model, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Developer-focused deployment guide describing dfx configuration, deployment steps, upgrade workflow, and cycle management.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Phased development plan outlining deliverables, non-goals, and scaling hooks from prototype to multi-installation architecture.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Visual style guide defining Whisper’s civic design philosophy, color system, typography, and UI styling principles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme tokens, light/dark mode variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root mount point and script bootstrapping the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout rendering the header, hero content, create-instance CTA, and conditional placeholder card.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Displays a placeholder card explaining future instance creation with examples and a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity persistence through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines sample React Query hook for checking parent-child relationships using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining the civic color system, typography, and theming variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file wiring React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, themes, typography, and custom utilities for the app.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, vision, architecture constraints, and requirements for a decentralized ICP-based hierarchical civic platform. Lists architectural notes, existing features, and design principles for modular, upgradeable canisters with stable-memory persistence.
